start-text: To start connecting to your node, please scan the QR code located on your device.
start-help-button: Where can I find the QR Code?
get-node-text: Visit our website to find out how to get one!
help-text: Connect to your DVPN node using a web browser on your computer.
help-instruction: To display the connection QR code, enter the node's local IP address in the web browser's address bar.
news-text: Stay up to date with new releases and updates!
